text: Hermann Greß (born 16 December 1954) is a German rower. He competed in the men's coxed pair event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:German male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of West Germany Category:Rowers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Würzburg
title: Hermann Greß
